Being a new city it can be difficult to find restaurants and bars in Songdo.

value: , Downtown. A korean BBQ restaurant famous for its beef BBQ and its huge platter of vegetables coming with it. They also serve the traditional Pork BBQ known as Samgyopsal. Try also the restaurant's other specialty the Cha-Dol Jigae a spicy fermented bean stew.
, Downtown, A newly-opened western-style bar/cafe with many cocktails, beers and house wine.They also serve nice bar food such as chili-nachos, fries or chicken.
